appendix.title: Changes from NISP Version 11 (K) to NISP Version 12 (L)
appendix.para: The NISP Version 12 - ADatP-34(L) represents an increased emphasis on C3 Taxonomy Service Nodes. Through concerted effort of the C3B Sub-structure and other stakeholders, 90% of NISP standards are now mapped to applicable Taxonomy Service Nodes. These relationships are highlighted through the new table layout of volumes 2 and 3, showing all standards listed for a given taxonomy node, as well as the responsible committee for its NISP entry and all capability profiles that reference each standard. NISP v11 also introduces the concept of the Base-Standards Profile (BSP), also referred to as the best-practices profile, for all mandated standards that are not part of a specific profile. Major content changes to NISP v12 include:

listitem.para: FMN Spiral 3 Profile added as Mandatory (Vol 2)
x RFCs processed. Details of the RFC changes are captured in Section 1.E.
